original_name: Randy Jackson Presents America's Best Dance Crew
plot: Hip-hop dance groups from around the U.S. compete for money and a chance to land a touring contract.

plot_es: Hip-hop dance groups from around the U.S. compete for money and a chance to land a touring contract.
title: Randy Jackson Presents America's Best Dance Crew
